main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified aerial objects reported by residents in New Orleans, Louisiana on April 10, 1950.
interesting points: Observers described the object as egg-shaped and fiery greenish purple,One witness noted a buzzing sound similar to a large engine's exhaust,Several witnesses estimated the object's size to be between 5 to 24 inches in diameter,The objects were observed moving from west to east across the sky,The sightings were documented by various individuals on the same night.
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. New Orleans and other residents; ordinary civilians including a retired Deputy Marshal and a seamstress, both around seventy years old.
